meaningMnemonic: Using <kanji>theory</kanji> and <kanji>reason</kanji>, you are one who uses much <vocabulary>logic</vocabulary>. Imagine this type of person, I bet you know at least one.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
